effects.name: Regeneration
effects.description: Your wounds heal rapidly. You feel a warm, healing energy flowing through you.

effects.name: Strength Boost
effects.description: You feel incredibly strong. Your muscles feel more powerful than usual.

effects.name: Cursed
effects.description: A dark curse weighs upon you. You feel your life force being slowly drained away.

effects.name: Blessed
effects.description: You feel protected by a divine blessing. A sense of peace and safety surrounds you.

effects.name: Afraid
effects.description: You are gripped by fear. Your hands shake and your mind races with terrible thoughts.

effects.name: Protected
effects.description: A protective aura surrounds you, making you feel more resilient.

effects.name: Enhanced Perception
effects.description: Your senses are heightened. You notice details that would normally escape your attention.

effects.name: Exhausted
effects.description: You are exhausted from your journey. Every movement feels like a struggle.
